Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Creature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class Creature
extends Entity
    This abstract class represents a creature

    • Method Detail

      • getAdjancentWalls

        public boolean[] getAdjancentWalls()
        Returns an array with whether or not there are walls around the creature. Index meaning: 0 = UP, 1 = RIGHT, 2 = DOWN, 3 = LEFT.
        Returns:
        adjancentWalls

      • getAdjancentTiles

        public java.lang.String[] getAdjancentTiles()
        This method returns an array with the adjancent tiles of the creature. Index meaning: 0 = UP, 1 = RIGHT, 2 = DOWN, 3 = LEFT.
        Returns:
        adjancentTiles
